summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5480 for the improvement of 26th Avenue Northwest, from West 73rd Street to the north line of Loyal Heights Addition, Division No. 6; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 69911, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
